subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] alphabet project
msgSnippet: ... Thanks--and woops! Yes, those are both big mistakes, but easily fixable ones. So you think I should continue in this vein, with the calligraphy pen? that
messageBody:
Moira O'Brien wrote:
>
>
> Hello Paul
>
> Your script is really beautiful with the calligraphy pen. However,
> there is one mistake that I can see - the letter KICK is on the wrong
> line, it is showing as a descender.
>
> As an aside - why do you spell ThoT with an h ? That would suggest to
> me that the pronunciation of that word was th-hoth. Just curiosity :).
>

Thanks--and woops! Yes, those are both big mistakes, but easily fixable
ones. So you think I should continue in this vein, with the calligraphy
pen? that the script does not look too angular for a standard alphabet?

By the way, how did you get ToT to appear in the right font in my
email--by using Unicode?

Thanks again for your feedback. It really helps.

Paul

Moira O'Brien wrote:
> 
> 
> Hello Paul
>  
> Your script is really beautiful with the calligraphy pen.  However, 
> there is one mistake that I can see - the letter KICK is on the wrong 
> line, it is showing as a descender.
>  
> As an aside - why do you spell  ThoT with an  h ?  That would suggest to 
> me that the pronunciation of that word was th-hoth.  Just curiosity :).
>  

Thanks--and woops! Yes, those are both big mistakes, but easily fixable 
ones. So you think I should continue in this vein, with the calligraphy 
pen? that the script does not look too angular for a standard alphabet?

By the way, how did you get ToT to appear in the right font in my 
email--by using Unicode?

Thanks again for your feedback. It really helps.

Paul
